title: Transgender Issues
desc: Comprehensive overview of transgender issues including gender identity, gender expression, and clinical practice guidelines.

title: Gender Identity Resolution
desc: APA resolution recognizing the efficacy, benefit and medical necessity of gender transition treatments for appropriately evaluated individuals.

title: Orientation and Gender Diversity in Youth
desc: Policy statement on supporting gender diverse youth and opposing discrimination.

title: LGBTQ Booklet
desc: Educational booklet providing information about LGBTQ issues, mental health, and affirming care.

title: Caring for Transgender Children
desc: Guide for supporting and caring for transgender children with recommendations for families, educators, and healthcare providers.

title: Gender Dysphoria Overview
desc: Official NHS guidance on gender dysphoria, including symptoms, diagnosis, and treatment options.

title: Position Statement on Attempts to Change Sexual Orientation, Gender Identity, or Gender Expression
desc: Position statement opposing any psychiatric treatment that attempts to change sexual orientation or gender identity.

title: Transgender Identity Reclassification
desc: WHO removes transgender identity from mental disorders classification, recognizing it as a sexual health condition instead.

title: UN Free & Equal Campaign
desc: UN campaign promoting equal rights and fair treatment for LGBTQ people worldwide.

title: Memorandum of Understanding on Conversion Therapy
desc: Agreement among UK professional bodies opposing conversion therapy and supporting affirmative approaches to gender identity.

title: Systematic Review of Transgender Wellbeing
desc: Meta-analysis of 55 studies showing that gender transition improves the wellbeing of transgender people, with 51 studies finding positive effects and only 4 showing mixed or no results.

title: Literature Review of Gender Dysphoria Treatment
desc: Review of 38 studies examining outcomes of gender transition, finding significant improvements in quality of life and mental health.

title: Quality of Life and Affirmed Treatment
desc: Study demonstrating improved quality of life following gender-affirming medical treatments.

title: Meta-analysis of Satisfaction with Gender Surgery
desc: Review of 28 studies showing high satisfaction rates with gender-affirming surgeries.

title: 24-year Longitudinal Study on Wellbeing
desc: Long-term follow-up study showing sustained improvements in wellbeing after gender transition.

title: 7-year Effectiveness of Affirming Care
desc: Study demonstrating steady improvement in psychological functioning over 7+ years with gender-affirming treatment in youth.

title: Desistance and Transition Persistence
desc: Study examining factors related to persistence and desistance in transgender youth.

title: Critique of Older Desistance Studies
desc: Critical analysis of methodological flaws in older studies claiming high desistance rates, showing these studies often misclassified subjects.

title: Analysis of 2015 Transgender Survey - Detransition Drivers
desc: Analysis showing most detransition is driven by external factors like discrimination and lack of support, not regret about gender identity.

title: 50-year Study on Gender Reassignment Surgery Regret
desc: Long-term study of gender reassignment surgery outcomes showing only 2.2% regret rate.

title: Meta-analysis of 27 Studies on Regret Rate
desc: Comprehensive meta-analysis of 27 studies showing an overall regret rate of approximately 1% following gender-affirming surgery.

title: Neurobiology Overlap in Transgender Individuals
desc: Study showing brain structure patterns in transgender individuals share characteristics with their experienced gender.

title: Cortical Thickness in Transgender Youth
desc: Research examining cortical thickness patterns in transgender youth, finding neurobiological correlates of gender identity.

title: Functional Connectivity Study
desc: Study of brain functional connectivity patterns showing alignment with gender identity rather than assigned sex.

title: Bone Structure & Hormones in Early Transition
desc: Research on bone density and structure changes with hormone therapy during early transition.

title: Bone Microstructure in Trans Women
desc: Study examining bone microarchitecture in transgender women on hormone therapy.

title: The Sex Spectrum
desc: Scientific article explaining that biological sex exists on a spectrum rather than as a simple binary.

title: Meta-analysis on Athletic Advantage
desc: Meta-analysis examining athletic performance in transgender individuals after hormone therapy.

title: Performance in U.S. Air Force Personnel
desc: Study of fitness test performance in transgender Air Force personnel before and after transition, showing performance changes align with hormone levels.

title: Effects of Discrimination on Health
desc: Systematic review showing discrimination has significant negative effects on physical and mental health of LGBT people.

title: Crime and Privacy in Restrooms Analysis
desc: Study finding no increase in safety or privacy incidents in jurisdictions allowing transgender people to use facilities matching their gender identity.

title: Bathroom Bill Discriminatory Effects
desc: Analysis of harmful effects of bathroom bills on transgender individuals' mental health and wellbeing.

title: 2018 LGBTQ Youth Report
desc: Comprehensive report on experiences of LGBTQ youth including discrimination, safety concerns, and mental health impacts.

title: Gender Identity 5 Years After Social Transition
desc: Study of 317 transgender children showing 94% still identified as binary transgender 5 years after social transition, with only 2.5% retransitioning.

title: Access to Care and 73% Reduction in Suicidality
desc: Study demonstrating that access to gender-affirming care is associated with a 73% reduction in suicidal ideation among transgender youth.

title: Puberty Blockers & Long-term Mental Health
desc: Research on long-term mental health outcomes of puberty suppression in transgender youth showing positive effects.

title: Induced Lactation Case Study
desc: First documented case study of successful induced lactation in a transgender woman achieving therapeutic milk production levels.

title: Additional Lactation Case Study
desc: Additional case study documenting successful lactation induction in transgender women.

title: Domperidone Safety for Lactation
desc: Information on the safety and use of domperidone for lactation induction.

title: Nutritional Content of Trans Woman's Milk
desc: Study analyzing the nutritional content and composition of milk produced by transgender women.

title: ROGD - Flawed Parental Survey
desc: Methodologically flawed study claiming "rapid onset gender dysphoria" based solely on parental surveys from biased sources, not validated clinical data. Widely criticized by medical community.

title: ROGD - Second Flawed Parental Survey
desc: Another methodologically flawed study promoting the discredited "rapid onset gender dysphoria" concept using biased parental surveys.

title: Swedish Mortality Study (Commonly Misinterpreted)
desc: Often misinterpreted study comparing post-transition individuals to general population (not pre-transition baseline). Authors have clarified it does not show transition causes harm, but anti-trans activists frequently misrepresent findings.
